article.title: DRC Awarded Contract to Support Air Force Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Work
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Dynamics Research Corporation (DRC) has received a one-year, $1.6 million contract to support the U.S. Air Force's 703rd Aeronautical Systems Group Predator/Reaper unmanned aerial vehicle program office. DRC will provide capabilities such as test/evaluation engineering, foreign military sales engineering, logistics, program management and analysis.
